title: Does anyone else have this problem?
body: I was on a draft game and I was in the champ select and then someone dodges not sure who and I get put in the lobby but then a message popped up and said this exactly “Because you abandoned a recent game during champ selection or declined too many games, you are currently unable to join the que” and I didn’t do either of those anyone know why? And it’s happened twice and the first time 5min wait then 15min wait
